messages.message:
Hi team.

<!here> we’ve enabled network policies in dogfood (not in denyAll mode right now) so if you see any Connection timeout issues then please update the N/W policy for the service/port here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/tree/master/deployment-configs/base-network-policies) or let us know. I’ll enable denyAll tomorrow and post that any communication b/w services which isn’t explicitly allowed will be blocked.
cc: @abhitaker @shikhar @Pranjal Rai for newer services you’re working on.
Thanks for sharing the info Shubham!!
Also, thanks a lot!! @sada who has done all the initial work to prepare the sheet and get it approved from the service owners. I’ve only made the YML version of that sheet.

We need to add network policy for fluent-bit (2020 ingress) and loki (3100, 9095 ingress & 7946 ingress+egress)
however this is only needed for internal environments and not customer
can you prepare a patch for them? not urgent you can do it tomorrow.

it will be for dogfood, we can create a separate dir `network-policies` in the dogfood env patches dir https://github.com/instabase/instabase/tree/master/deployment-configs/environment-patches/dogfood

patches need to applied to some base target. right?
Here what would the base
@kunal how can we do it? create another dir parallel to base-network-policies/
